title: Brown denies 'shafting' and misleading drivers as Palou case continues
summary: McLaren chief has dismissed accusations that he misled drivers in contract discussions, amid the ongoing court case involving IndyCar champion Palou

qa_pairs.question: Who is the current chief of McLaren F1 Team?
What championship did Alex Palou win before being involved in a contract dispute?
What type of accusations is Zak Brown denying regarding contract discussions?
